techmeme.title: Apple says it's using Amazon's Trainium and Graviton chips to serve search services and is evaluating if Tranium2 chips can be used to pre-train its AI models (Kif Leswing/CNBC)
AWS launches Automated Reasoning checks to combat AI hallucinations, and Model Distillation, a tool to transfer the capabilities of a large model to a small one (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Cameo launches CameoX, allowing creators to self-enroll and expanding beyond A-list celebrities, after piloting the app since May 2023 and adding 31K creators (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
AWS announces Project Rainier, a cluster that will contain "hundreds of thousands" of Trainium2 chips, slated for 2025 and to be used by Anthropic (Belle Lin/Wall Street Journal)
AWS announces general availability of Trainium2 chips, and EC2 Trn2 UltraServers, which feature 64 Trainium2 chips; Trainium3 is slated for 2025 (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
